songs.title: Lovers In the Deep End
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Nothing's the way that it was
Heart's spoken, words broken
The love that we had, now is lost
We've shattered what mattered
I should have known it, it should have clicked
You never showed it, you never did
Yeah it's convenient but what's the point?
Since you don't really mean it, I don't have a choice
Heart's broken

[Chorus]
Heart's spoken, words broken
It's never ending, lovers in the deep end
Dreams shattered, nothing matters
Let's stop pretending, lovers in the deep end
I'm sick of doubting what you mean to me
Our love is drowning in an ocean, deep

[Verse 2]
You say you love me, is that the truth?
You only love me the way that you want to
Can't keep believing, I know we're at the end
There's never a beginning coming back again

[Chorus]
Heart's spoken, words broken
It's never ending, lovers in the deep end
Dreams shattered, nothing matters
Let's stop pretending, lovers in the deep end
I'm sick of doubting what you mean to me
(Lovers in the deep end)
Our love is drowning in an ocean, deep
(Lovers in the deep end)

[Bridge]
Lovers in the deep end
Heart's spoken, words broken
The love that we had, now is lost
Dreams shattered, what matters?

[Chorus]
Heart's spoken, words broken
It's never ending, lovers in the deep end
Dreams shattered, nothing matters
Let's stop pretending, lovers in the deep end
I'm sick of doubting what you mean to me
(Lovers in the deep end)
Our love is drowning in an ocean, deep
(Lovers in the deep end)

[Outro]
Oh, oh, oh, trust (We're breaking apart)
Oh, oh, oh, truth (We're breaking apart)
Oh, oh, oh, me (We're breaking apart)
Oh, oh, oh, you, you're breaking my heart
